data.name: Wars Across The World: Serbia 1914
data.detailed_description:
Serbia 1914 simulates the great offensives of the Austro-Hungarian empire against Serbia and Montenegro during the first month of the Great War, in the Balkans. The three Austrian armies must crush the Serbian forces and capture Belgrade. The Serbians are powerful, but their resources are scarce, whether to resist...or counter-attack!




Serbia 1914 lasts 18 turns representing each one week between August 1st and December 15, 1914. The two players, Austria-Hungary and Serbia are facing each other in the heart of the Balkans. None of the two side has completed its mobilization when war starts.

  • The Serbians use their central position and their recent experience in combat gained in the conflicts of 1912 and 1913. They can also count on their minor ally Montenegro.
  • Austria-Hungary has three separate armies to crush Serbia, but its leadership is poor.

The game's event cards allow full replay ability thanks to the numerous various situations that they create on the diplomatic, military, political or economical fields, such as the departure of the Austrian Second Army to Galicia or the siege of Cattaro

Estimated Playtime: 2h30.
Favored Side: none.
Hardest to Play: none.

data.short_description: Serbia 1914 simulates the Austro-Hungarian offensives against Serbia and Montenegro during the first month of WW1, in the Balkans. Three Austrian armies must crush Serbian forces and capture Belgrade. The Serbians are powerful, but their resources are scarce, whether to resist...or counter-attack!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB NVIDIA GeForce 9600 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB DirectX 11 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 or higher
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal supporting graphic card (2012 latest)
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.9 or higher
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal supporting graphic card (2012 latest)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
